content: > get email updates 1 to hear about shaina s new designs video tutorials class schedule and receive subscriber-only introductory discounts on pattern releases skill level beginner the cheery holiday scarf is a quick-to-knit fringed scarf using 4 strands of fingering weight yarn held together create your own stunning marled color combination and maybe use up some stash in the process too construction details the scarf is worked in one piece fringe is added after the scarf has been knit skills required cast on/bind off knit/purl slipping purlwise with yarn in front knitting through the back loop adding fringe video links to my youtube channel tutorials 2 are included sizes one size finished measurements approximately 5 5 /14 cm wide x 60 /150 cm long excluding fringe gauge 13 sts and 14 row = 4 /10 cm in pattern using size needle to obtain gauge needles us 13 9 mm or size needed for gauge adjust needle size as necessary to obtain the correct gauge yarn approximately 200 yards each of four strands of fingering weight cyca #1 yarn plus extra for fringe to work the scarf in one strand of yarn use 200 yards of bulky weight cyca #6 yarn plus extra for fringe the sample scarf shows 2 strands of hand dyed yarns by shaina bounce 85% superwash merino wool 15% nylon 394 yds/100 g 1 ball held together with 2 strands of hand dyed yarns by shaina whirl boucle - 100% superwash merino wool 492 yds/100 g 1 ball fringe was made with 1 mini skein of yarns by shaina bounce 78 yds/20 g ﻿other materials tapestry needle scissors size k 7mm crochet hook for attaching fringe 1 https //www shainabilow com/mailing-list 2 https //www youtube com/shainabilow
